mainSection.title: Background Checks for Your Security
paragraphs: Are you renting out a property? Do you know who you're renting your apartment to? A background check is a preventative measure against potential future problems.

Our comprehensive background check service provides you with important information about individuals and companies with whom you plan to enter into a business relationship. We verify data in public registers, execution and insolvency registers, and other available databases.

whatis.title: What is a Background Check
whatis.description: A background check is a comprehensive verification of a person or company in all available registers and databases. You'll gain insight into property relations, potential executions, insolvencies, and other important information.

importance.title: Why are background checks important?
importance.description: Are you renting out a property? Entering into a business agreement? Want to know who you're signing a contract with? A background check provides you with key information to help you make an informed decision and protect your interests.
importance.details: Our comprehensive background check includes verification in the property registry, insolvency register, central execution registry, commercial registry, and other public databases.

benefits.title: Benefits of Background Checks
benefits.description: A background check is a preventative measure that can save you significant costs and time in the future. Investing in a background check will return many times over in the form of safer business relationships and peace of mind.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here you'll find answers to the most common questions about our background check service.

questions.question: How long does it take to process a background check?
questions.answer: We process most background checks within 24 hours on business days from ordering and payment.

questions.question: What information do I need to order a background check?
questions.answer: For a background check on an individual, you need their first name, last name, and date of birth. For a company check, just the company ID is sufficient.

questions.question: Are background checks legal?
questions.answer: Yes, our background checks are conducted solely based on publicly available information and registers in accordance with current legislation and GDPR.

questions.question: How will I receive background check results?
questions.answer: We'll send the background check results to your email in the form of a comprehensive report in PDF format. The report contains all identified information and expert commentary on the results.

questions.question: Can I use a background check for employment purposes?
questions.answer: Background checks are primarily intended for verifying trustworthiness in property rentals and business relationships. For employment purposes, we recommend consulting with a lawyer regarding what information you can legally use in that context.
